item.title: [Intro to Computational Thinking] Introduction to Computational Thinking via Simulation with R
item.description: “What I cannot create, I do not understand” – Richard Feynman “It is immoral to collect data before simulating the hypothesized data generating process.” – Andrew Gelman (what I remember of a comment to the Stanford Causal Inference Seminar in 2020). 📝 Lesson Preview Why simulate? Simple simulation workflow Documenting Functions in R Monte Carlo with apply and parallelization Debugging in R
